quote: So I began to think maybe it was true that when you were married and had children it was like being brainwashed, and afterward you went about as numb as a slave in a totalitarian state.
quote_letters: SO I BEGAN TO THINK MAYBE IT WAS TRUE THAT WHEN YOU WERE MARRIED AND HAD CHILDREN IT WAS LIKE BEING BRAINWASHED AND AFTERWARD YOU WENT ABOUT AS NUMB AS A SLAVE IN A TOTALITARIAN STATE
